content.label: This game is a joy to play! The sprites and music are top notch and each level offers fun challenges. I’m a fan of the Kirby and Box Boy series, so it’s great to see HAL develop another stellar title!
Good

I purchased this game after seeing it was made HAL, it was a really great find! After finishing my first time through, I was really pleased. But I did see that “To Be Continued...?”. Im pretty sure its a HAL thing, but please please please PLEASE!!!! Continue this game!!

This game is frustrating, now most will take that as a bad thing, and sure it can be but what separates this game from others is when i’m mad its not at the game it’s at myself. One very overlooked aspect of video games is you should never feel like you failing is the games fault. The controls and physics are tight and realistic and make it so when you mess up it is your fault. That beautifully frustrating moment of watching the tower that took so much concentration to build up tip like being sucker punched in the gut in slow motion. And what adds to the frustration is that its your fault. The game is beautiful as well and the art style adds a layer of polish to this incredible game that many phone games lack. There is a very distinct difference between playing on a game boy and playing on a phone. When you play on a handheld console you feel like your playing a game and when you play a phone game there is this sense of cheapness and lack of heart in the games, but this game crosses the line. it is very clear that a lot of love and dedication was put into making this game.
Best phone game since ridiculous fishing
My favorite studio since the original smash bros. back in the N64 days... if only there were an iPhone port of Melee would be amazing but Nintendo would never let that happen..
This game needs a sequel/update, needs to be ported to the 3ds, and Part Time UFO for smash bros ultimate.

title.label: Amazing game from the Kirby devs!

content.label: This short, sweet game is amazing and has no in game purchases. All there is is a $3.99 price. It may be short but I would love more costumes and new levels. There is a amazing game and it proves to gamers that HAL can make a game not Kirby themed.
Wish it was longer, but well worth the price considering there aren’t any obnoxious IAP or ads
Without a doubt one of the best games you can buy. Adorable and hours and hours of fun. Enjoyed getting to 100% medals.

This game has an all around enjoyable atmosphere. The simple but engaging game design combined with the adorable aesthetic and sound design provides for a wonderful experience. I would expect no less from the team behind Kirby.
Thanks good work
A lot more fun than it has any right to be. This is coming from someone who detests phone games but this is super fun.

The music is cute 
And in the main menu relax
And during play is intense 
And the game play is fun and tricky 

Like a claw game that actually grabs the prize 

Worth it ❤️
Awesome
Free, Fun, Fantastic; a must play
U mad Kirb and he is lit so I thinc that this is lit.Also Qb

title.label: Kirby retro kind of feel to it!

content.label: You can absolutely tell it’s by Hal Lab. It has that Kirby kind of feel to it.
The best mobile game ever

title.label: I wish I could be full time!

content.label:
Part time UFO is my favorite mobile game so far. It’s enjoyable and challenging enough to keep you occupied for a while but simple enough for quick jaunt while waiting in line. Each stage has fun and fair goals to try to achieve and it really adds replay value. 

Highly recommended!
All I can say is get the game yes its that good

title.label: It’s made by Hal, nuff said

content.label: It’s a fun cute well polished game with quirky characters, good controls, and satisfying gameplay. It’s art in game form so just buy it already
What a charming little puzzle game— seems tailor made for touchscreens. Catchy soundtrack, to boot.

This game is a must have if you enjoy any types of games on your phone. I grew up with a DS and had fond memories of Wario Ware. This game takes many elements from that with a much more relaxing tone. I love all the music in this game and each song perfectly fits the theme of the level. My only wish is for more! Hopefully updates with more content are available because I love this game way too much for it to be over
OMG this game was like so good it’s like simulator
This is SOOOO worth the money
It’s always nice to see a game on the App Store that feels like a complete experience. This one plays great and has some clever touches in its mission design.
If you’re a fan of kirby this game is for you great music graphics and fun! Good work Hal!

Weary of violent and money hungry game apps? Me, too. I spent $2.99 and have already had that much fun in the last 24 hours. This is a silly, funny, kooky game that has just the right difficulty factor and odd ball scenarios to play. It’s tricky and entertaining. Using easy to accumulate points, you can get helpful tools for your Part Time UFO thingy and no money required...yippeee! 
The music/sound is retro early 2000’s cute...I like it and I usually mute every game’s music and sound. 
This game is totally worth the price. It isn’t easy, it isn’t difficult. It’s a balanced game that is addictive. Kids can play, nothing r rated or weird. Entertainment doesn’t have to include snipers or grand theft auto. 
Part Time UFO is first rate and lives up to it’s excellent reviews.

If you are concerned about how long it will last until you are bored don’t worry I got it a week ago, beat it 100 precent, and it is still fun to play BTW the same people who made this game made Kirby. I can’t wait for HAL egg to make another game oh wait I can I have PTUFO to play until I am bored cya’ in the year 2020.

title.label: Another Excellent Game By Hal Labs.

content.label:
I’m an absolute sucker for Hal Laboratory, Kirby and BOXBOY! being some of my favorite game franchises of all time.
So, when I heard Hal Labs. made a mobile app, I had to buy it.

This game is excellent and does not disappoint. Its charming graphics and cosmetics, along with its levels and mechanics makes it an absolute blast to play. 

It’s weird to think that such an out-there idea of a UFO that does part-time jobs could work; and yet, it does. 

I very much recommend this game to anyone looking for a fantastic expierence.

title.label: One of the best games ever

content.label: At first I though this was another game where you just waste your money but now I know that it’s actually one of the best games I have ever played
This game is really fun. For me, is challenging. Smooth game, good graphics!
Simple. Charming. Cute. Fun. Aside from one or two obtuse medal requirements, I enjoyed all of it.
Very fun! Worth 4 dollars
i’m glad i got this, it’s very cute
This game was so much fun the graphics were amazing and the art style was amazing I seriously suggest you get it if you’re on the fence!

title.label: This is what paid mobile games should be.

content.label: No adds. No constant flood of in app purchases. Cute, polished, and novel gameplay. Price point was incredibly fair. Easily one of the best mobile games i’ve played since ridiculous fishing and wish more major studios would make bite sized gaming experiences for mobile.

Reminds me of the unique type of gem you’d only find on Nintendo handheld platform, makes sense the developer is freakin’ Hal laboratories. Better than anything Nintendo has published on iOS so far, and I really loved Mario RUN, you need to play this game to understand the brilliance or you can just My and nearly everyone else’s word for it and place a $5 bet on having a great time, it’s a safe bet I promise.
will be stuck in your head.
Being made By HAL and it shows, the quality is great and the game is a joy to play.

So I was REALLY REALLY enjoying this game. But then it started crashing way too much and at the wort times possible. I’m playing on a brand new IPhone X, so I know for a fact it’s the game. I hope the developers address this because, it really is a cool and entertaining game.

If you know HAL, then you know what you're getting already. Cute style, fun gameplay, and a touch of good humor. If you don't know HAL, rest assured that they are one of the best developers that Nintendo has. Great for all ages!

title.label: Great fun and charming art style!

content.label: Another great game from HAL
So Cute! You guys owe Jared Petty of Kinda Funny Games a commission for this purchase!
Such a fun game. I love HAL Laboratory!

title.label: An amazing game by the Kirby devs

content.label: You can tell this was made by the Kirby team.

You guys are amazing I love Kirby and I really enjoy the last one on the Switch, but I can’t not take my Switch with me to my job and outsides everyday and this games makes me happy because it’s fun and it has all the magic that makes your games so special. Again thank you guys.
Thank you so very much for the iPhone X support. Finicky people like myself are jumping for joy 🙌🏿
Love the soundtrack.  Worth it so far.
